metadata.title: CVE-2007-3123

platform: SUSE CORE 9 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE CORE 9 for Itanium Processor Family

metadata.description: unrar.c in libclamav in ClamAV before 0.90.3 and 0.91 before 0.91rc1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (core dump) via a crafted RAR file with a modified vm_codesize value, which triggers a heap-based buffer overflow.
